reviews.review: Uno de los mejores juegos que existen, totalmente recomendado
This game is awsome. If you haven't play the game you missed something.
Îch liebe das Spiel
brilliant!

Прошел с удовольствием!
+Отличная головоломка. 
+Хороший сюжет 
+Неожиданные поворооты
+Во время игры не встретил ни одного бага
+Портальная пушка превосходна 
+Геймплей весьма хорош
+Разработчик Valve
+Coop
+Много нового со времен первой части
+Графика для игры отличная (старый Source ещё тянет)
Оценка 10\10

Игра интересная, больше всего радют забавные фразы Гледес и этого маленького "помошника", прошел 1 часть, очень обрадовался, ну а на счет 2 сказать много не могу, успел пройти за пару часов лишь 8 глав, но все же советую окунуться в этот мир, где вы с друзьями можете посоревноваться в быстроте мышления и набрать много странных но увлекательных достижений, если честно, то я ради достижений и играю во все игры)) Ставьте пальцы вверх и покупайте;)
Просто супер пупер мега игра!! Покупайте не задумываясь это Шедевр!

So much replay value in this game to me! It has so many puzzles that I want to just play over and over! Then there is the online ability to play puzzles other players have created, and the ability to create your own! I love this game from start to finish! Every few months I go back and play through it again just to do it. Anyone who loves solving puzzles and challenging yourself, GET THIS GAME!

Ótimo jogo, porém algumas vezes a legenda sumia e era obrigado a parar de jogar para prestar atenção nos diálogos e traduzir. ALém disso, o jogo não inicia 80% das vezes e trava sem nenhuma razão aparente.
"Complete Chamber 3 in the Hard-Light Surfaces co-op course using only 5 total portal placements" fuck off

11 тортов из 10!

Это не игра, это бомба, так перевернуть портал, превратить из мирных камер в динамичные разрушаемые камеры, ты становишься орудием для завоевания управления, тебя гоняют, испытывают, пытаются расплющить, кидают, использую. Что с тобйо только не делают. Всеми способами над тобой издеваются. И встает вопрос, можно ли доверять роботам? Проверьте сами. =) 
Юмор в игре на высоте, тебя одновременно и пытаются убить, и пошутить))) Выходит забавно. Кол-во в игре сарказма зашкаливает. 
В общем игра стоит своего, даже вдвойне. Берите и получите море позитива)
Awesome, Love this game. I cannot wait for a third.

Probablemente el mejor juego que he jugado este año. Tiene más de todo, y mejor, si es que alguno de nosotros creía que era posible. Cuando piensas que el modo historia va a acabar te das cuenta de que son capaces de darle otra vuelta de tuerca.

Perfecto desde la primera escena a la banda sonora de los títulos de crédito.
Excellent..
Игра интересная, но сюжет проходится очень быстро. Зато много комнат созданных игроками.
Very good about Physik.

Les plus:
+ L'ambiance!! Elle reprend là où Portal 1 avait laissé et explore d'avantage. Certains environnement sont à couplé le souffle.
+ Le gameplay suit la même approche, développant davantage ce qui fonctionnait, et ajoutant certaines nouvelles fonctionnalitées (les glus)
+ une ambiance également accrues grâce à la bande son qui joue parfois dans le rétro, parfois dans le spatiale.
+ une histoire finalement assez présente pour un puzzle game, avec des personnages étrange mais attachant.
+ un mode coop agréable, et une liste immense de map à télécharger et à jouer avec des amis (combien de soirées à jouer avec un pote, avec micro, et d'heure restées bloqués sur une énigme :D )

Les moins:
- mettre tout au max peu se ressentir sur certaines machines, surtout lorsqu'il est demandé d'avoir du skill (faire plusieurs actions durant un saut)

Antes de tener Steam lo tenia pirata y me lo pasé 10000 de veces , 100% recomendado para todo tipo de publico , muchas horas de diversion aseguradas =D

I <3 Valve

I was told that this game was cool, and since it was included in my Valve Complete Pack I decided to play it. After 5 hours I finished having went through numerous test chambers and an old laboratory. 

Personally I found it a weird game, with a strange kind of humor and a kinda weird theme. If you are into shooter games and thinking to buy this game, don't do it, except if you like puzzle/adventure games with futuristic theme.

Half-Life 2 did it better.

The user reviews and critic reception don't lie. Portal 2 is literally the HIGHEST RATED GAME ON STEAM, not much else to say. If you really really REALLY haven't played this absolute masterpeice of game... PLAY IT NAOWWWWW!!! Stop reading this review and BUY IT AND (more importantly) PLAY IT!


Pros:

- ITS PORTAL 2! WHY AM I EVEN WRITING THIS?!

Cons:
- [REDACTED]
-
-

If you STILL aren't convinced that this will be the best game you will ever purchase, than I give up. Thanks for reading this review at least.

Portal es un juego muy bueno para poner a prueba tu destreza mental y tiene un modo coop que te dara mas horas de diversion en compania de un amigo.
Si busca un juego con una buena historia este juego igual es muy bueno.
Portal es un juego que tiene mapas de la comunidad para seguir jugando y sacarle lo maximo a este juego asi que no hay pretexto para no tenerlo.
Gud
Basically perfect.

I have played the first Portal and I have nearly finished game too. If you thought the first one was a little short then you will love this one. It has much more gameplay and many more addded features throughout the game. You will love it!

The puzzle game series you will buy. HANDS DOWN! 

Ignore other puzzle games like Fez or Thomas was Alone. Just look at the buy button and click it. Why?

Good stuff:
- Graphics are Half-Life 2 based - Which is amazing coz Half-Life 2!
- The game will make you think about what you are doing
- Comedy... This game has too much if that is such a thing. You will laugh and people will look at you wierdly, but, I mean come on - SPOILER ALERT! - Wheatly is the funniest robot you will find
- Portals - this game will confuse you with mind-bending portals and gels which create surfaces that will allow you to bounce and slide your way through your very own portals

Bad stuff:
- This game doesn't know the words "glitch", "bug", "bad", "shit"

Overall: Just play Portal 1 before Portal 2, trust me.
The book was better
Portal 2 is a game of portals. The game is well done, not buggy, and has a brilliant story. Its the sort of game you can play for hours but still be immersed in its story.
BEST COOP GAME EVER

One of the, if not the, top candidates for "best game ever made".

If you have not played this, you need to.
Ein geniales Spiel sowohl im Singel, als auch im Multiplayer.
Игра реально очень хорошая, затавляет пораскинуть мозгами. А играть с другом ещё веселее.
Simplemente Hermoso, Portal 2 es un juego exquisito, con la musica y la jugabilidad, este juego de Puzzle es probablemente el mejor de su especie. comprenlo.
Best and favorite game ever. And with the workshop and cooperative mode it is also endless. Must have.

This game is one of the greatest ever created. It's story telling and puzzle functionality are alone absolutely fantastic, but the mix was absolutely perfected by Valve. The game never had a dull moment, and was pretty much perfect.
Ótimo game.  O jogo não é tão dificil mas contém momentos que te deixaram maluco. Os diálogos são perfeitos, com uma boa dose de humor.

Шикарная игра-головоломка ,множество разнообразных заданий. Многие задания покажуться легкими,а не которые заставят попотеть,но в целом игра очень сбалансированна. Графика и аудио на все 10. Главные злодеи шикарны. Мультиплеер очень радует. Этот мультиплеер создан именно для двоих игроков,но не советовал бы играть с кем-то ,кто тебе не знаком. 
Ставлю играе 10/10
One of the best games I've ever played. Excellent graphics, story, and most of all,  gameplay.
An absolutely great game! Loved the puzzles and the ending was amazing. Sad that it's over though. . .

Great experience playing through it. Levels are challenging and exciting. And there's some quality humor mixed in. But it's one of those games that you can really only play once. That first playthrough experience was worth it though.

Portal 2 has to be one of the  smartest, clever, and charming games I've ever played
Get the cake < Get trolled Scrub

This game is terrific in all the ways and it will definitely be in my Top 5 games list because the game is literally perfect. The Story is absolutely great. It is also funny at some points and little details like that makes the games even better than it already is. At first you can find it hard to solve all these tests when you think you can't even make one. But in the end you CAN do it. Levels are perfect. It does not require a high IQ and when you get used to it you can play very fluently afterwards. Though it can get a little difficult at some points. Because it requires momentum too. And creativity, a lot. But I think Co-op is the best part of the game because even when you play a football or a racing game, it is twice as fun while playing with a friend. And if you do that in Portal 2 the fun is in the extreme level. What they say: "Two brains are bigger than one" This game delivers it perfectly in all the ways that you can think of in a game. I sincerely thank Valve Inc. for developing this game, it was pretty fun. I usually played this game offline so it might not show the time I spent on this game exactly. I give this game 9.5/10. Because it is a little difficult game and it's not for everyone.
This game is really outstanding,I love Portal2!
This is just.... one of the best games ever created. And the user-made puzzles just keep on making it better.

Puzzles and more puzzles - time to get the thinking cap on. Using a Portal Gun,  could be handy in real life - one whole at whome and the other at work - walk through the hole and be instantly at work - no commuting no traffic no cyclists, anyway back to the game. Using the portal gun - Red / Blue / Grey gel switch and cube - find your way through the maze of puzzle rooms - over bottomless pits. I thoroughly enjoy this would be happy to see a Portal 3!
I've been avoiding this game for some reason, why I have no idea!!! This game is GREAT!!!

Игра доставляет во всём. Только ты подумаешь что любые головоломки тебе по плечу, а эта игра уже выдаёт тебе следующий уровень, в котором ты застрянешь. Отличная графика радует уже который год! Помню, с выходом Orange Box'а   эта игра поражала!(и продолжает поражать.) Вот, спустя несколько лет я открыл для себя co-op режим. Восторг!
P.S.- считаю эту игру достойной звания игры десятилетия, наравне с HL2, а может даже более достойной.
